scripts.watch: npm run watch-dist & npm run watch-tests & wait
scripts.buildall: npm run build-dist && npm run build-tests
scripts.build-dist: mkdir -p dist/ && browserify . -s videojs-playlist -o dist/bundle.js && browserify . -s videojs-playlist -p deumdify > dist/global.js
scripts.build-tests: mkdir -p dist/ && browserify test/karma-qunit-shim.js test/*-test.js -u test/karma.conf.js -s videojs-playlist -d -o dist/tests.js
scripts.watch-tests: mkdir -p dist/ && watchify test/karma-qunit-shim.js test/*-test.js -u test/karma.conf.js -s videojs-playlist -v -d -o dist/tests.js
scripts.test: jshint src/**.js test/**.js index.js && npm run build-tests && karma start test/karma.conf.js --single-run
scripts.test-watch: npm run watch-tests & karma start test/karma.conf.js --auto-watch & wait
